biotools.summary: DrNote is an open tagging tool for text annotation and entity linking based on OpenTapioca and WIkiData/Wikipedia. It provides an entity linking service with pre-trained data for medical annotations in multilingual settings. The processing of raw text as well as PDF by a tesseract backend is supported.
